definitions.definition: An inverted state : a state in which something has been turned ( properly ) upside down or ( loosely ) inside out or backwards .
The result of an inversion , particularly :

subdefinitions.definition: The reverse of any procedure or process .
A ratio etc. in which the antecedents and consequents are switched .
The result of a circle inversion ; the set of all such points ; the curve described by such a set .
The non - truth - preserving proposition constructed by negating both the premise and conclusion of an initially given proposition .

definitions.definition: A second element which negates a first ; in a binary operation , the element for which the binary operation —when applied to both it and an initially given element — yields the operation 's identity element , specifically :

subdefinitions.definition: The negative of a given number .
One divided by a given number .
A second function which, when combined with the initially given function , yields as its output any term inputted into the first function .

definitions.definition: A morphism which is both a left inverse and a right inverse .
The winning of the coup in a game of rouge et noir by a card of a color different from that first dealt ; the area of the table reserved for bets upon such an outcome .
A grammatical number marking that indicates the opposite grammatical number (or numbers) of the default number specification of noun class.

main_definition: An inverted state : a state in which something has been turned ( properly ) upside down or ( loosely ) inside out or backwards .
secondary_definitions: The result of an inversion , particularly :

( mathematics ) A second element which negates a first ; in a binary operation , the element for which the binary operation —when applied to both it and an initially given element — yields the operation 's identity element , specifically :
( category theory ) A morphism which is both a left inverse and a right inverse .
( card games ) The winning of the coup in a game of rouge et noir by a card of a color different from that first dealt ; the area of the table reserved for bets upon such an outcome .
( linguistics , Kiowa-Tanoan ) A grammatical number marking that indicates the opposite grammatical number (or numbers) of the default number specification of noun class.
